Publications

Refereed Articles in International Journals

  2. Martín Dias, Mariano Martinez Peck, Stéphane Ducasse and Gabriela Arévalo, Fuel: A Fast General-Purpose Object Graph Serializer, Journal of Software: Practice and Experience, 44, 433-453, John Wiley & Sons, Ltd., 2014, Impact Factor (2012) 0.519, PDF, DOI.

Refereed Articles in International Conferences

Refereed Articles in International Workshops

  4. Martín Dias, Mariano Martinez Peck, Stéphane Ducasse and Gabriela Arévalo, Clustered Serialization with Fuel, Proceedings of ESUG International Workshop on Smalltalk Technologies (IWST 2011), 2011, PDF, DOI.
